notes: Project initialized by initializer agent. 50 issues created covering infrastructure, authentication, challenges, matches, submissions, judging, credits, web UI, VS Code extension, admin, tournaments, and styling. Renamed to RepoRivals (QUI-56). Rewards Marketplace feature added (15 issues). Complete spec addition (50 issues) covering all remaining phases.

feature_additions.description: Rewards Marketplace - SaaS partner offsets, sponsored compute, leaderboard rewards, admin tools

spec_additions.description: Complete implementation specification covering infrastructure, observability, auth flows, challenge versioning, match state machine, judging pipeline, credit ledger, anti-abuse, tournament formats, and production hardening
